body_html:
It's an NVCC bug. https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/

Unfortunately I don't think there is anything we can do here, other than waiting for NVIDIA to fix this. Previous reports are at #3963 and #6939.

@soumith should we leave this and/or #3963 open?

@ngimel Do you know when this will (or is already) fixed? Oh from the above post it seems that CUDA 9.2 already fixed this. @zasdfgbnm Can you try that?
body:
It's an `NVCC` bug. https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/

Unfortunately I don't think there is anything we can do here, other than waiting for NVIDIA to fix this. Previous reports are at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3963 and https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/6939.

@soumith should we leave this and/or #3963 open?

<del>@ngimel Do you know when this will (or is already) fixed?</del> Oh from the above post it seems that CUDA 9.2 already fixed this. @zasdfgbnm Can you try that?
